A creative consultancy working in the fields
of visual and verbal communication.

Christopher Doyle & Co.

  • What we do
  • What we don’t
  • What we want
  • Selected work
  • Profile
  • Contact

Christopher Doyle & Co. is the creative consultancy of Sydney based Creative Director, Christopher Doyle. No surprises there.

An internationally recognised designer with over ten years experience in brand and design Chris has worked at some of Australia’s leading brand and design agencies. His work has won numerous local international awards, been used as the basis for education material in Europe and the United States and appeared in feature articles for Creative Review and Grafik Magazine.

In 2009 he was named one of Indesign Magazine’s Top Ten Faces and Forces of Design and in 2011 his work was selected to be part of Graphic Design: Now in Production (GD:NIP) – a joint exhibition with Cooper-Hewitt and the National Design Museum in America.

He has lectured at AGIdeas (Melbourne), Creative Mornings (Sydney), Billy Blue College of Design (Sydney) and has sat on the New South Wales council for the Australian Graphic Design Association (AGDA).

He has made written contributions to Desktop Magazine, Design Assembly, Australian Creative and Process Journal and has served as a judge at D&AD and AWARD.

He also once found a piece of Nutri-Grain that looked like E.T. then sold it on eBay for a thousand dollars. True story.
